transcript.text: If you see personal data where it shouldn’t be, report it!

panelText.text:
If you witness or suspect a failure to adequately protect personal or sensitive data, you have a duty to report it. You can:
  • contact the Data Privacy team at privacy@jci.com
  • tell your manager or the Law or Compliance team
  • call or log the concern on the Johnson Controls Integrity Helpline
If you have any questions about any aspect of data privacy, seek guidance from one of our resources.
For further information, consult the Johnson Controls Personal Data Protection and Privacy Policy.
